derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent. (originally US): probably a variant of jynx 'wryneck' (because the bird was used in witchcraft)

entry.tran: 倒霉蛋；扫把星；不祥的人（或物）
entry.def: You can call something or someone that is considered to be unlucky or to bring bad luck a jinx .

example.ex: He was beginning to think he was a jinx.
example.tran: 他开始认为自己是个倒霉蛋。

means.word_mean: 1. a person believed to bring bad luck to those around him

sentences.sentence: "a witch put a curse on his whole family"

means.word_mean: 1. cast a spell over someone or something; put a hex on someone or something
